text: My parents are kicking me outI posted this in r relationships and it was deleted because I should call a hotline but I called one before and they didn t help me  I don t want to kill myself but my parents hate me after a failed attempt  This was my post in r relationships My parents threatened to kick me out of the house before because we were fighting but they didn t do it  I was feeling bad about myself and my life and had a few drinks which made me more impulsive about deciding to kill myself  I snort heroin but never IVed it before and I decided I would IV a large enough dose to kill me  It turns out I got a weak batch and I didn t die but I did overdose and had to be revived  Before my memory went blank I remember feeling amazing from the IV rush and regretting my decision  I didn t want to kill myself anymore and I m glad it didn t work  My parents were shocked by the overdose and very disappointed in me  I didn t want to tell them I was suicidal so the overdose came across as me being irresponsible with my drug use  My parents are furious and are kicking me out of the house next week because they think I m a bad kid for doing drugs  I don t want to tell them that it was a suicide attempt because I don t think that s something they would feel better knowing  Being kicked out is scaring me because I don t think I ll keep my will to live if I m homeless  Can I explain how I m feeling to my parents and avoiding being kicked out without giving away my intention of suicide tl dr  I attempted to kill myself with a large dose of drugs but failed  My parents don t know it was a suicide attempt and think I m a dumb drug addict and are kicking me out  How do I apologize to my parents and give a good excuse for my actions without giving away that I was suicidal  I m scared that being kicked out will make me want to kill myself again

text: A mom who is so sad and hopelessI m a mother  I m supposed to be strong and be able to deal with everything and sometimes feel like I just can t anymore  My son has autism and sometimes I feel like I am failing him by being overwhelmed  My husband is so patient  but I seem to lack the ability to be so myself  Last night  when my little guy had a meltdown and wouldn t stop screaming  I just locked myself in the bathroom and cut myself over and over  My husband took my son upstairs and watched him while he finished his work since he works from home  I can t even take care of my child  I lay on the bathroom floor and just thought about how much better off they d be without me  My husband can remarry  and my son won t have this pathetic anxiety ridden idiot for a mother I m in therapy  and my therapist is good  But I m scared if I tell her just how much I want to die I ll be committed  She knows that I think about it  but last night I was the closest I ve ever been to actually doing it  I just feel so hopeless and like I don t contribute enough I m sorry for this long post  but after spending a lot of time on here reading posts  I can t help but feel like all of you are the only ones who truly understand  My husband said if I did it  it would be the easy way out  since it s harder to work through the pain  He has no fucking clue what it s like to be in the heads of people who think like we do  Anyway  thanks for listening and letting me rant

text: Crying into the void  hoping to hear the cries of others Made this post in r Depression https www reddit com r depression comments e xs too guarded too mistrustful but i desperately  Didn t get much of a response  Maybe I ll get more here I cannot live in a world where everyone is as surface level as they seem  I want to believe that every person is a genius  That everyone has the potential for brilliance  that they can all help humanity become what we are supposed to be  But I have no reason to believe that I am a wreck  My emotions are easily unbalanced  I am often wrong about very simple things until they are explained to me  I can t motivate myself to do anything  But I have so  so many  ideas  Every moment of my life I come up with  ideas  Ways to optimize boring tasks  Philosophical arguments  Great creative works and entire worlds in my head  Thinking about what I ll do in the future  what I ve done in the past  what I m doing in the present  I want to believe that everyone has the same kind of experience There seem to be two possibilities    I am a modern goddamn Socrates who for some reason is ten times smarter and more aware than the average person  but cannot on my fucking life get through college successfully   There are other people out there who share this pain  People who I want to help  People who I want to talk to In the case of possibility   I might as well just die  This world is never going to be good enough for me  But the longer I live  the more I say and hear  the less likely possibility   seems This sounds overly dramatic  It s funny in a certain way  But it is authentically how I feel right now  I am revealing myself in a way that I have literally never done before  I hope it pays off
summary: Made a post in Reddit's r depression forum. It didn't get much response, but he hopes to get more. He is depressed because he can't motivate himself to do anything. He has a lot of ideas, but can't get through college.
